page.title: Ornament of the Great Vehicle Sūtras

revision.text:
{{DRL Metadata |citation=Dharmachakra Translation Committee. Ornament of the Great Vehicle Sūtras: Maitreya’s Mahāyānasūtrālaṃkāra with Commentaries by Khenpo Shenga and Ju Mipham. Boston: Snow Lion Publications, 2014. |author=Maitreya; Asanga |translator=Dharmachakra Translation Committee |contributors=Khenpo Shenga; Ju Mipham; Maitreya; Asanga |fulltitle=Ornament of the Great Vehicle Sūtras: Maitreya’s Mahāyānasūtrālaṃkāra with Commentaries by Khenpo Shenga and Ju Mipham |place=Boston |publisher=Snow Lion Publications |pubdate=2014 |edition=1st edition |editiontype=Hardcover |isbn=978-1-55939-428-4 |pubsubtype=Translation |topic=Philosophy, Sutra |index=Yes |totalpages=1021 |glossary=Tibetan-Sanskrit-English |notes=Endnotes |language=English |translation=Tibetan to English |canonical=Yes |noncanonical=Yes |sourceauthor=[[Maitreya]]
[[Asanga]]
[[Khenpo Shenga]]
[[Ju Mipham Gyatso]] |sourcetitle=[[Mahāyānasūtrālaṃkāra]] ([[theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa]])
[[Theg pa chen po mdo sde’i rgyan gyi dgongs don rnam par bshad pa theg mchog bdud rtsi’i dga’ ston]]
[[Theg pa chen po’i mdo sde’i rgyan ces bya ba’i mchan ’grel]] |citationofsourcetexts=[[Asanga]]. [[Mahāyānasūtrālaṃkāra]] [[theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa]]), D 4020, sems tsam, phi 1b1-39a4. Translated by T. Śākyasimha and dpal brtsegs.[http://tbrc.org/link?RID=O1GS6011|O1GS601137641$W23703 TBRC LINK W23703]
[[’ju mi pham ’jam dbyangs rnam rgyal rgya mtsho]], 1846–1912. A Feast of the Supreme Vehicle ([[Theg pa chen po mdo sde’i rgyan gyi dgongs don rnam par bshad pa theg mchog bdud rtsi’i dga’ ston]]). In Sde-dge dgon-chen Prints of the Writings of ’Jam-mgon ’Ju Mi-pham-rgyamtsho. Edited by Dilgo Khyentse. Vol. 2. Kathmandu: Shechen Monastery.
[[mkhan po gzhan dga']] (gzhan phan chos kyi snang ba), 1871–1927. Annotation Commentary on the “Ornament of the Great Vehicle Sūtras” ([[Theg pa chen po’i mdo sde’i rgyan ces bya ba’i mchan ’grel]]). Edited by Konchhog Lhadrepa. Delhi: ’Bri gung nyi ma lcang ra’i par khang, 1993. |canonicalgenre=Cittamātra, Sems tsam |lcclassification=bq3002.e5d53 2014 |lcsubjects=1. Yogācāra (Buddhism)—Early works to 1800. I. Maitreyanātha. II. Gźan-phan-chos-kyi-snaṅ-ba, Gźan-dga’, 1871–1927. III. Mi-pham-rgya-mtsho, ’Jam-mgon ’Ju, 1846–1912. IV. Dharmachakra Translation Committee. |library=Physical and digital |librarylocation=Special Collections |sectionarea=Dharmachakra |physicalcondition=Good |numberofcopies=1 |pagecreationdate=2015/02/17 |librarynote=Needs content |containedin= |abbreviation= |affiliate= |affiliatewebsite= |noncanonicalgenre= }}

page.title: Ornament of the Great Vehicle Sūtras/Publication data

revision.text:
Dharmachakra Translation Committee.
Ornament of the Great Vehicle Sūtras.
Maitreya’s Mahāyānasūtrālaṃkāra
with commentaries by Khenpo Shenga and Ju Mipham.
Boston: Snow Lion, an imprint of Shambhala Publications, 2014.

[[{{BASEPAGENAME}}/Publication data|Publication data]]

Snow Lion An imprint of Shambhala Publications, Inc. Horticultural Hall 300 Massachusetts Avenue Boston, Massachusetts 02115 www.shambhala.com © 2014 by Dharmachakra Translation Committee All rights reserved. No part of this book may be reproduced in any form or by any means, electronic or mechanical, including photocopying, recording, or by any information storage and retrieval system, without permission in writing from the publisher. 9 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 First Edition Printed in the United States of America oThis edition is printed on acid-free paper that meets the American National Standards Institute z39.48 Standard. kShambhala Publications makes every effort to print on recycled paper. For more information please visit www.shambhala.com. Distributed in the United States by Penguin Random House LLC and in Canada by Random House of Canada Ltd Library of Congress Cataloging-in-Publication Data Asaṅga, author. [Mahāyānasūtrālaṃkāra. English] Ornament of the Great Vehicle Sūtras : Maitreya’s Mahāyānasūtrālaṃkāra with commentaries by Khenpo Shenga and Ju Mipham / translated by Dharmachakra Translation Committee.—First edition. pages cm Includes translations from Tibetan. isbn 978-1-55939-428-4 (hardback) 1. Yogācāra (Buddhism)—Early works to 1800. I. Maitreyanātha. II. Gźan-phan-chos-kyi-snaṅ-ba, Gźan-dga’, 1871–1927. III. Mi-pham-rgya-mtsho, ’Jam-mgon ’Ju, 1846–1912. IV. Dharmachakra Translation Committee. V. Title. bq3002.e5d53 2014 294.3'85—dc23 2013047535

page.title: Ornament of the Great Vehicle Sūtras/Table of Contents

revision.comment: Created page with "*Translators’ Introduction vii *Ornament of the Great Vehicle Sūtras 1 *Title and Translator’s Homage 4 **1. How the Scripture Was Composed 5 **2. Establishing the Teachi..."
revision.text:
*Translators’ Introduction vii *Ornament of the Great Vehicle Sūtras 1 *Title and Translator’s Homage 4 **1. How the Scripture Was Composed 5 **2. Establishing the Teachings of the Great Vehicle 21 **3. Going for Refuge 41 **4. Potential 59 **5. Developing the Enlightened Mind 77 **6. Practice 109 **7. Reality 125 **8. Power 145 **9. Full Maturation 157 **10. Enlightenment 181 **Summary of Chapters 1 through 10 261 **11. Inspiration 265 **12. Investigation of the Dharma 285 **13. Teaching 397 **14. Practice 429 **15. Practical Instructions and Advice 453 **Summary of Chapters 11 through 15 489 **16. Skillful Means 491 **17. Transcendences and Means of Attraction 497 **18. Worship, Reliance, and the Immeasurables 571 **19. The Factors That Accord with Enlightenment 639 **20. The Qualities 777 **21. Activity and Perfection 863 **Colophons 927 *Appendix: A Visual Representation of *Mipham’s Topical Outline 931 *Notes 963 *English-Tibetan Glossary 969 *Tibetan-English-Sanskrit Glossary 977 *Bibliography 987 *Index 991
<noinclude>{{DRL subpage basecategories}}</noinclude>

{{#ask: [[Category:Books]] [[{{PAGENAME}}]] | ?translator | ?author | ?fulltitle | ?series | ?place# | ?publisher | ?pubdate | ?lcclassification | format=template | template=citation | limit=1 }}
The scans of this item are available at the bottom of this page. If you would like to request that portions of this text be added to the DRL, Email the research department here: [mailto:Research@tsadra.org?Subject=RE:%20Text%20Request Request a text from the Research Department]. To check to see if the physical copy of this text is available for purchase, click the ISBN number in the info-box and follow the links. If this text is not easily available for purchase, and you would like to request a digital version, you may likewise contact the Research Department. Remember that any digital book or other content shared through the DRL is meant for Tsadra Staff and Fellows '''ONLY'''.
